title: Tasty Stir-fried Chicken in Black Bean and Black Pepper Sauce Recipe
content:
Delicious chicken cooked in a spicy black bean and pepper sauce. This tastes amazing with noodles or fried rice. It is not only delicious but fast to make as well.

When I was looking for dinner inspiration online, I came across a picture of a spicy chicken served with some noodles. I got so inspired by that so I made it almost immediately.

This chicken dish is so easy to make, you need basic ingredients. If you use small chicken pieces then it will be tastier.

 

Stir Fry Chicken in Black Bean & Black Pepper Sauce

 

Prep time: 10 mins

Cook time: 30 mins

Total time: 40 mins

 

Recipe type: Main

Cuisine: Chinese

Serves: 4 servings

 

Ingredients

For Chicken:-

Boneless Chicken - 500 grams cut into small pieces

Soy Sauce - 2 teaspoons

Vinegar - 1 teaspoon

Salt to taste

Sugar - ¼ teaspoon

Cornflour - 2 tablespoon

Oil - 4 tablespoon

 

For Sauce:-

Oil - 1 tablespoon

Ginger - 1 teaspoon chopped

Onion - 1 chopped

Spring Onion - 1 chopped

Black Bean Sauce - 2 tablespoon

Water as needed

Black pepper powder to taste

 

Instructions

Mix chicken with all ingredients.

Heat oil in a pan. Add in chicken and saute till golden.

Remove it to a plate.

Heat oil in a pan. Add ginger, onions and spring onion.

Add in sauce and saute for a min.

Add in water and mix well.

Add chicken back in and cover. Cook for 5 to 8 mins.

Add in pepper powder and mix well.

Serve it.

recommendations.title: Tasty Couscous  With Sumac Chicken And Butter Mushrooms Recipe
Tasty Chicken Lasagna Recipe
recommendations.content:
Lasagna is quite easy to make but it can feed a crowd. All you need is to make some tomato sauce and white sauce and you are good to go. You can make a huge batch of it and make multiple pans of lasagna and freeze it. You can directly bake frozen lasagna and enjoy on busy weeknights.
